Package org.projet.model.gameengine

Class City

java.lang.Object
org.projet.model.gameengine.City
public final class City extends Object
The city of the game with its buildings, its habitants, its shop and its manager (the player)

  • Constructor Details

    • City

      public City(ShopBuyer manager)
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager of resources

  • Method Details

    • dayEnd

      public void dayEnd()
      The end of one day in the city, making the player collect and provide resources, decremeting by one unit the construction time of all the buildings under construction, moving an under construction building to the constructed building list if its construction time is finished

    • getCurrentProduction

      public Resources getCurrentProduction()
      Returns:
      the resources produced by all the constructed buildings

    • getCurrentConsumption

      public Resources getCurrentConsumption()
      Returns:
      the resources consumed by all the constructed buildings and the citizens of the city

    • buyMaterials

      public boolean buyMaterials(Material.Type type, int quantity)
      Let the player buy materials from the city shop
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the material
      quantity - The quantity of the material
      Returns:
      true if the player was able to buy the materials from the shop

    • buildNewBuilding

      public boolean buildNewBuilding(Building.Type type)
      Put a new build under construction in the city
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the new building
      Returns:
      false if the number of free habitants from the city + the number of habitants created by the building is inferior to its minimum workers number

    • upgradeBuilding

      public boolean upgradeBuilding(int key)
      Try to upgrade a constructed building
      Parameters:
      key - The index of a constructed building in the city
      Returns:
      false if the player don't have enough resources to upgrade the building

    • removeExistingBuilding

      public void removeExistingBuilding(int key)
      Remove a constructed building
      Parameters:
      key - The index of a constructed building in the city

    • removeUnderConstructionBuilding

      public void removeUnderConstructionBuilding(int key)
      Remove a building under construction
      Parameters:
      key - The index of a building under construction in the city

    • addWorkersToBuilding

      public boolean addWorkersToBuilding(int key, int quantity)
      Try to add workers to a constructed building
      Parameters:
      key - The index of a constructed building in the city
      quantity - The quantity of workers to add
      Returns:
      false if the number of free habitants in the city is inferior to the given quantity

    • removeWorkersFromBuilding

      public boolean removeWorkersFromBuilding(int key, int quantity)
      Try to remove workers from a constructed building
      Parameters:
      key - The index of a constructed building in the city
      quantity - The quantity of workers to remove
      Returns:
      false if the removing the given quantity does not respect the minimum number of workers needed in the building

    • getConstructedBuildings

      public Map<Integer,Building> getConstructedBuildings()
      Returns:
      the constructed buildings in the city

    • getUnderConstructionBuildings

      public Map<Integer,Building> getUnderConstructionBuildings()
      Returns:
      the buildings under construction in the city

    • getNbHabitants

      public int getNbHabitants()
      Returns:
      the total number of habitants in the city

    • getNbFutureHabitants

      public int getNbFutureHabitants()
      Returns:
      the number of future habitants "coming" to the city with the construction of some buildings

    • getNbWorkers

      public int getNbWorkers()
      Returns:
      the current number of habitants working in buildings

    • getNbFutureWorkers

      public int getNbFutureWorkers()
      Returns:
      the number of current/future habitants that are going to work with the construction of some buildings

    • isWinning

      public boolean isWinning()
      Returns:
      true if there is a launching rocket platform fully upgraded and with the maximum number of workers currently working
